title: Power BI Update - July 2023
excerpt: Welcome to the July 2023 update! We are pleased to announce even more updates to On-Object interaction, as well as datasets for Mobile.   Tune in for all of these updates and more in Reporting, Modeling, Data Connectivity, Service, Mobile, Developers, and Visualizations.  Full blog:  Follow us on Twitter
